duties_responsibilities.duty: Assisting in the development of strategy and operations plans for build-to-rent projects.
Supporting divisions and project management in project planning and execution along with tracking performance metrics.
Providing on-site support to purchasing and operations team as needed (site planning, delivery/logistics coordination, planning meetings, presentations).
Developing and maintaining budgets and schedules that conform to project requirements.
Developing work breakdown structure and process view to identify opportunities for process improvement.
Ensuring appropriate internal reviews are made per process requirements and provide reporting to executives and business units as needed.
Creating and documenting procedures and best practices for BTR “Play-Book”.
Supporting change management processes through identification of project risks and trends.
Maintaining business agility necessary for project success.
Traveling to other markets 2-3 times per month, overnight, to visit job sites.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Construction Management, or related field OR equivalent relevant professional experience in the construction industry.
